entry.title: https://github.com/EnzymeAD/Reactant.jl
entry.content: Optimize Julia Functions With MLIR and XLA for High-Performance Execution on CPU, GPU, TPU and more.

entry.title: https://github.com/JuliaRegistries/General
entry.content: The official registry of general Julia packages

entry.title: https://github.com/Jutho/KrylovKit.jl
entry.content: Krylov methods for linear problems, eigenvalues, singular values and matrix functions

entry.title: https://github.com/LuxDL/Lux.jl
entry.content: Elegant and Performant Scientific Machine Learning in Julia

entry.title: https://github.com/SciML/Catalyst.jl
entry.content: Chemical reaction network and systems biology interface for scientific machine learning (SciML). High performance, GPU-parallelized, and O(1) solvers in open source software.

entry.title: https://github.com/SciML/CellMLToolkit.jl
entry.content: CellMLToolkit.jl is a Julia library that connects CellML models to the Scientific Julia ecosystem.

entry.title: https://github.com/SciML/DiffEqBase.jl
entry.content: The lightweight Base library for shared types and functionality for defining differential equation and scientific machine learning (SciML) problems

entry.title: https://github.com/SciML/ModelingToolkit.jl
entry.content: An acausal modeling framework for automatically parallelized scientific machine learning (SciML) in Julia. A computer algebra system for integrated symbolics for physics-informed machine learning and automated transformations of differential equations

entry.title: https://github.com/SciML/NonlinearSolve.jl
entry.content: High-performance and differentiation-enabled nonlinear solvers (Newton methods), bracketed rootfinding (bisection, Falsi), with sparsity and Newton-Krylov support.
